Title: Relates to the term "employee" for the purposes of defense and indemnification in the public officers law
Summary: Removes provisions of law relating to sheriffs; includes sheriffs within the term "employee" for the purposes of defense and indemnification in the public officers law.
LawCode: Amd ยง18, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the term "employee" for the purposes of defense and indemnification of officers and employees of public entities
